data.title: Synthesis and Structure of a Novel Silver Salt

paragraphs.context: The synthesis and x-ray crystal structure of a novel silver salt of the weakly coordinating carborane anion B11CH12- is detailed in the article. The synthesis conditions and structural parameters are provided in tables and supplementary materials.

qas.question: What is the main focus of the article published in the Journal of the American Chemical Society in 1985?

answers.text: The synthesis and x-ray crystal structure of a novel silver salt of the weakly coordinating carborane anion B11CH12-

qas.question: Which journal published the article on the synthesis of a novel silver salt in 1985?

answers.text: Journal of the American Chemical Society

qas.question: In which year was the article detailing the synthesis of a novel silver salt published?
What type of anion is involved in the synthesis of the novel silver salt described in the 1985 article?
What is the DOI of the article that discusses the synthesis and structure of a novel silver salt?
How many authors contributed to the article on the synthesis of a novel silver salt published in 1985?
Based on the article, what is the significance of the carborane anion B11CH12- in the synthesis of the novel silver salt?

answers.text: It is a weakly coordinating anion

qas.question: What structural information is provided about the novel silver salt in the article?
Is the supplementary material for the article on the novel silver salt synthesis available online?
Does the article provide detailed synthesis conditions for the novel silver salt?
Was the article on the novel silver salt synthesis published by the American Chemical Society?
Is the novel silver salt described in the article a compound of silver and a strongly coordinating anion?
According to the article, does the novel silver salt have applications in industrial chemistry?
Is the synthesis of the novel silver salt a single-step process as described in the article?
Does the article mention the use of any other metals besides silver in the synthesis of the novel salt?
What is the role of the carborane anion in the structure of the novel silver salt according to the article?

answers.text: It acts as a weakly coordinating anion

qas.question: How does the article contribute to the field of chemistry according to its content?

answers.text: By detailing the synthesis and structure of a novel silver salt

qas.question: What can be inferred about the complexity of the novel silver salt's structure from the article?

answers.text: It is complex enough to require x-ray crystallography for its structural elucidation

qas.question: Based on the article, what might be the implications of using a weakly coordinating anion in the synthesis of silver salts?

answers.text: It could lead to the formation of novel compounds with unique properties

qas.question: What does the publication date of the article suggest about the progress in the field of silver salt synthesis?

answers.text: It indicates ongoing research and development in the field since at least 1985
